Dialogue: I can never thank you enough for coming with me.
The worst part was seeing Mom cry.
I donâ€™t think she regrets leaving Dad or anything. She's just realising she'll always be lonely now. There's no way to mend things.
We should make a pact. We should solemnly swear that we will never let each other be lonely.
Come on! Let's hold hands and say the words.
I don't know. It's raining... We should make a move, or we'll get soaked.
Who cares? This is your funeral suit now, you should just burn it when you get home.
Give me your hand! There. Repeat after me. I, solemnly swear...
Wait, I'm pretty sure we used our names for this. Why can't I remember your name? Do you remember mine?
Player_Name, does it hurt? I miss you.
I miss you too. Why can't I remember your name?
